headline: Everest Announces Chief Financial Officer Transition
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, November 20, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing world-class reinsurance and specialty insurance solutions, today announced the appointment of Elias Habayeb as EVP and Group Chief Financial Officer, to be effective on or about May 1, 2026.

headline: EXL named a Leader in Everest Group’s 2025 Clinical and Care Management Operations PEAK Matrix® Assessment
summary: NEW YORK, Nov. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- EXL [NASDAQ: EXLS], a global data and AI company, announced that it has been named a Leader in Everest Group’s Clinical and Care Management (CCM) Operations PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025 report. The Everest Group report evaluates 20 leading CCM operations providers through its RFI process, client reference checks, and ongoing market analysis.
